this is fun

Curse those developers, every time I return to my computer I open a new tab, if one isn't open already, and go to convore. It's already beginning to replace email in importance (and earlier brought me to tears of laughter on one thread)

@leah  @bastienlabelle I thought it had something to do with the suffix "-vore" like in carnivore or omnivore -- that you're "voracious for conversation". ... then again maybe my imagination is getting the better of me.
